tuv.seg: The Office of the Data Protection Commissioner is responsible for upholding the privacy rights of individuals in relation to the processing of their personal data
Tá Oifig an Choimisinéara Cosanta Sonraí freagrach as cearta príobháideachta gach duine a chosaint maidir le próiseáil a sonraí pearsanta
These rights are contained in the Data Protection Acts 1988 and 2003 (pdf)
Cuimsítear na cearta seo sna hAchtanna um Chosaint Sonraí, 1988 agus 2003 (pdf)
The Acts state that information about you must be accurate, only made available to those that should have it and only used for specified purposes

Luaitear sna hAchtanna nach mór go bhfuil faisnéis fút cruinn, nach mór go gcuirtear faisnéis faoi dhaoine ar fáil ach dóibh siúd ar cheart dóibh an fhaisnéis a bheith acu agus nár cheart an fhaisnéis a úsáid ach chun críocha sonraithe
You have the right to access personal information relating to you and have any errors corrected or, in some cases, have the information erased
Tá an ceart agat chun faisnéis phearsanta a bhaineann leat a rochtain agus go gceartófar aon earráidí nó, i roinnt cásanna, go scriostar an fhaisnéis
If your information is being held for the purposes of direct marketing, you can have your details removed
Má tá d’fhaisnéis á coimeád ar mhaithe le margaíocht dhíreach, féadfaidh tú iarraidh go mbainfear do shonraí
Data protection rights apply to information held on computer or in manual or paper files
Baineann cearta um chosaint sonraí le faisnéis a choimeádtar ar ríomhaire nó i lámhleabhar nó i gcomhaid pháipéir
The Commissioner is appointed by the Government and is independent in the exercise of her functions
Tá an Coimisinéir ceaptha ag an Rialtas agus bíonn sé/sí neamhspleách i bhfeidhmiú a f(h)eidhmeanna
Individuals who feel their rights are being infringed can complain to the Commissioner
Féadfaidh daoine aonair a bhraitheann go bhfuil a gcearta á sárú gearán a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir
She has powers to enforce the provisions of the Act
Tá na cumhachtaí aige/aici chun forálacha an Achta a fhorfheidhmiú
If you suffer damage as a result of a breach of your data protection rights, you may sue for damages through the courts
Má bhíonn tú thíos le díobháil thromchúiseach mar gheall gur sáraíodh do chearta um chosaint sonraí, féadfaidh tú agairt a dhéanamh le haghaidh damáistí trí na cúirteanna

The Commissioner also maintains a register, available for public inspection, giving general details about the data handling practices of many important data controllers, such as government departments and State-sector bodies, financial institutions, and any person or organisation who keeps sensitive types of personal data

Coimeádann an Coimisinéir clár, chomh maith, atá ar fáil le haghaidh imscrúdú poiblí, a thugann sonraí ginearálta faoi chleachtais láimhseála sonraí go leor rialtóirí tábhachtacha sonraí, ar nós ranna rialtais agus comhlachtaí earnáil an Stáit, institiúidí airgeadais, agus aon duine nó eagraíocht a choimeádann saghsanna íogair de shonraí pearsanta
To access information relating to you, send a letter or email to the organisation or person holding your personal details and ask them for a copy of this information
Chun faisnéis a bhaineann leat a rochtain, seol litir nó ríomhphost chuig an eagraíocht nó an duine a choimeádann do chuid sonraí pearsanta agus iarr orthu cóip den fhaisnéis a thabhairt duit
You should receive them within 40 calendar days of your request
Ba cheart go bhfaighfeá an chóip laistigh de 40 lá féilire tar éis d’iarratas
You may have to pay a small fee of €6.35
B’fhéidir go mbeidh ort táille bheag €6.35 a íoc
If you find that an organisation or person has details about you that are not factually correct, you can ask them to change or, in some cases, remove these details
Má thugann tú faoi deara go bhfuil sonraí fút ag eagraíocht nó ag duine nach bhfuil i gceart go fíriciúil, féadfaidh tú iarraidh orthu iad a athrú nó, i roinnt cásanna, na sonraí a bhaint
If you feel that they do not have a valid reason for holding your personal details or that they have taken these details in an unfair way, you can ask them to change or remove these details
Má bhraitheann tú nach bhfuil cúis bhailí acu do shonraí pearsanta a choimeád nó gur ghlac siad na sonraí seo ar bhealach éagórach, féadfaidh tú iarraidh orthu na sonraí seo a athrú nó a bhaint
You can also ask them not to use your personal details for purposes other than their main purpose
Chomh maith leis sin, féadfaidh tú iarraidh orthu gan do shonraí pearsanta a úsáid ar chuspóirí eile seachas dá bpríomhchuspóir
Write to the organisation or person, explaining your concerns or outlining which details are incorrect
Scríobh chuig an eagraíocht nó chuig an duine, mínigh do bhuarthaí nó tabhair cuntas ar cén sonraí atá mícheart
Within 40 days, they must do as you ask or explain why they will not do so
Laistigh de 40 lá, caithfidh siad an méid a d’iarr tú orthu a dhéanamh nó a mhíniú cén fáth nach ndéanfaidh siad amhlaidh
Further information on your rights and how to obtain them is available on the Commissioner’s website
Tá fáil ar bhreis faisnéise ar do chearta agus ar conas iad a fháil ar láithreán gréasáin an Choimisinéara
To make a complaint to the Data Protection Commissioner, simply write to or email the Commissioner explaining your case
Chun gearán a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí, ní gá ach ríomhphost a sheoladh nó scríobh chuig an gCoimisinéir agus do chás a mhíniú
You should include the following details:
Ba cheart duit na sonraí a leanas a chur san áireamh:
• The name of the organisation or person you are complaining about
• Ainm na heagraíochta nó an duine a bhfuil tú ag gearán fúthu
• The steps you have taken to have your concerns dealt with
• Na bearta a ghlac tú go ndéileálfar le do bhuarthaí
• The details of any response you have received
• Sonraí faoi aon fhreagairt a fuair tú
You should provide copies of any letters or emails exchanged between you and the organisation or person
Ba cheart duit cóipeanna d’aon litreacha nó ríomhphoist a seoladh idir tú féin agus an eagraíocht nó an duine a sholáthar
If the Commissioner agrees with your complaint, she will try to make sure that the organisation or person obeys the law and puts matters right
Má chomhaontaíonn an Coimisinéir le do ghearán, déanfaidh sí iarracht a chinntiú go gcloíonn an eagraíocht nó an duine leis an dlí agus go gcuireann siad na ceisteanna ina gceart
If the Data Protection Commissioner does not accept your complaint, you may appeal to the Circuit Court against her decision within 21 days
Mura nglacann an Coimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí le do ghearán, féadfaidh tú achomharc a dhéanamh leis an gCúirt Chuarda i leith a cinnidh laistigh de 21 lá
Read more about complaining to the Data Protection Commissioner on the Commissioner’s website
Féadfaidh tú breis faisnéise a léamh faoi ghearán a dhéanamh leis an gCoimisinéir Cosanta Sonraí ar láithreán gréasáin an Choimisinéra
